ReportTitle: Procurement Reform Starts with Requirement Formulation and Supply Chain
Author: RUSI Commentary
MainClaim: Better requirements and supply-chain clarity will speed delivery
Evidence: Cites historic programme slippages; urges upstream rigour
RealityCheck: Requirements alone don’t unlock authority/liability/IP at contract award
PolicyLever: Create option-contract lane with delegated authority at 1* for trials→adoption
NotesCritique: Good diagnosis; weak on contracting teeth

ReportTitle: Putting the UK Defence Command Paper Refresh into Context
Author: RUSI Commentary
MainClaim: The Refresh multiplies commitments without resources
Evidence: Quotes lines of effort; budget constraints
RealityCheck: Accurate but still rhetorical—no mechanism to cancel legacy to fund adoption
PolicyLever: Publish kill-list + re-programme to option pools
NotesCritique: Names the problem; lacks the lever

ReportTitle: The case for expanding digital public infrastructure
Author: Wilkinson et al.
MainClaim: DPI is prerequisite for secure digital state capability
RealityCheck: Transfers poorly to defence without trials/certification and ranges
PolicyLever: Stand up defence DPI + test corridors linked to ranges

ReportTitle: Industrial Roadblocks: Producing at Scale and Adopting New Tech
Author: CSIS
MainClaim: Surge production + faster adoption need joint planning + capital
RealityCheck: Right—but without option contracts you won’t crowd-in private cap
PolicyLever: Adopt option ladders with volume bands + outcome-pricing
NotesCritique: Clear on scale; soft on incentive change

ReportTitle: From Production Lines to Front Lines
Author: CNAS
MainClaim: Munitions mismatch requires portfolio shift to production
RealityCheck: UK analogue needed; shift dies without delegated authority
PolicyLever: Delegate to 1* to place options up to £X within guardrails

ReportTitle: Improving Defense Acquisition: Insights from Three Decades
Author: RAND
MainClaim: Recurring failure modes point to workforce + portfolio fixes
RealityCheck: Evidence-dense but agnostic on adoption finance tools
PolicyLever: Stand up adoption finance instrument (options + guarantees)
NotesCritique: Bring levers to UK DEFCON/IP reality

ReportTitle: European defence industrial strategy in a hostile world
Author: Bruegel
MainClaim: Defragment demand + common procurement to scale EU industry
RealityCheck: Political will + certification regimes block pace
PolicyLever: Use pooled options with mutual recognition + standard test packs
NotesCritique: Realistic on fragmentation; show the fix

ReportTitle: European defense tech start-ups: in it for the long run?
Author: McKinsey
MainClaim: Europe needs deeper scale-up capital + talent pipeline
RealityCheck: True but without adoption instruments capital won’t stay
PolicyLever: Issue outcome-priced adoption frameworks tied to trials
